name: flespi-camera
description: flespi Camera is a camera mobile web app that uses flespi CDN as a storage for photos
author: Evgenij Spitsyn <evgeniy@spitsyn.net>

scripts.deploy: quasar build -m pwa && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -R dist/pwa-mat/* misc CNAME LICENSE package.json deploy && cp README.md deploy/README.md && node_modules/git-directory-deploy/bin/git-directory-deploy.sh -ddeploy -bgh-pages -rhttps://github.com/flespi-software/Camera.git && rm -rf deploy
